title: Fail to start the smarta-data-source and smarta-smart-ticket-task pods
content:
The smarta-data-source and smarta-smart-ticket-task pods fail to start.
The following error message appears in the pods' log files:

Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: column "version_rank" doesn't exist

Cause

This issue is possibly caused by some exceptional database schema changes.

Solution

Log in to the Smart Analytics database with the owner permission or as a database manager and run the following command:

ALTER TABLE schema_version ADD COLUMN version_rank integer;
